name: Devil's Lair
description:
"Devil's Lair" is a Comedy Local Coop Couch Game made with Unity with a Third Person view in which two very average adventurers end up kidnapped by the Devil, for his own distraction.
To hope to escape his Lair, you and your friend must combine your strengths to solve puzzles and fights Bosses, bringing you closer and closer to the surface.

This Project was my End of Degree Group Project, made by four Game Designers (including me) and four Game Artists in 4 weeks.
